features.featureTitle: In the full caf√© environment (frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvironment.tsx), duplicate the existing table + 4-chair seating set and add 3 additional identical sets placed in the right-side area of the room (positive X side), ensuring each set has a clear gap from walls and from other furniture and does not overlap other seating sets.

In the fallback environment (frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafeRoomFallback.tsx), duplicate the existing table + 4-chair seating set and add the same 3 additional identical sets placed in the right-side area (positive X side), keeping chair rotations facing their table.
